TimelineContent.heroTitle: Ndiri murasi kubva England unotsanana kuzunguka US/UK/EU muAirBnb's. Ndinofarira crypto, startups uye software development. Ndine background munzira yeventure capital neacting.
TimelineContent.timeline2025Title: Yakakwira LiquidOps mainnet & kunzwa kuenda mberi
TimelineContent.timeline2025Description: Mwaka uno ndakatumira nguva yangu yakukwira [LiquidOps' mainnet](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1905268807746060790?s=20). Imwe yezvizf√ºggetlen zvinhu zvandakadzidzira mwaka uno ndiyo kuti startups hazvina zvose pamusoro pezviwanikwa. Growth nemamarketing ari nofananidzira (kana zvakawanda) sekuzivikanwa kwezviwanikwa, saka ndakakwira [kugadzira content](/projects#content-creator) nokudzinzira growth.
TimelineContent.timeline2024Description: Ndakavhura pfungwa ye[LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops) pamwe ne[Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer) gore rino mushure megumbo-raini-remhando rinoyerera muCambridge kwaandairamba ipapo. [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) rairimo muyawo uye takafunga zvakakurumidza kuhumanisha mawere orwendo rumubvunzo weikosiyi. Ndakavigiravo kuzora se Engineering Partner pana [AO Ventures](https://aoventures.io). Ndakabatsira muti muumbiranzo uye ndakabatsira kuzvigadzirei vanhu vakayambira paDemo Day kubva kunzira yemupaji, ndakambosvika neni pandakavhura nemhando yangu - [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops).
TimelineContent.timeline2023Description: Ndakave nomusi wemunzira-yese pamunhu wokutanga nenguva ye[Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) kamwe mushure kwemukurumbidzo yewo. Ndakadzozerai mukurumbidzo we[Wallety](/projects#wallety) kugonera zvizvo ngazvese paArweave's ecosystem. Munguva yangu pano ndakavaka [Othent](/projects#othent), Oases uye [Subsidise.js](/projects#subsidisejs).
TimelineContent.timeline2022Title: Ndasangana neCommunity Labs & ndakadzisunza kutaura kodzero
TimelineContent.timeline2022Description: Shure kwandkaona kuti kushanda nemaupe kwakanga kusina kundifarira zvakawanda sesokukodza, ndakaenda neshoko remisikidzo kudzidza kusanganisa code kubva pamuzi. Ndakazoita sekunge ndakakurumidza kudzidza kusanganisa code ndikavaka purojekiti yangu yokuutanga [Wallety](/projects#wallety). Kwakanga kwakapimisa asi kwakasimudzira. Ndakazoita sekunge ndakakurumudzira mhinduriro ye [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) akanga ava shamwari yangu yakadanana ndikakubvumira kumudzokera kwaari pa [Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) sepakutanga kwedu Fellows kunze.
TimelineContent.timeline2021Title: Ndakakasira muCrypto VC kubva mumubhedha wangu
TimelineContent.timeline2021Description: Ndakambopima basa ramusangu paCrypto venture capital fund kubva pakupikirira-kuenda kwemugore woutsinye. Ndakavigira mwedzi mitatu pasina mari ndisati ndabaipiswa mari yemumunhu womubasa, ndakazvigira gore panyaya dzomunhu nomavhindu avo. Ndakavigira nguva yangu inini, muchidzidzo chezvangu paDealflow, ndakaverenga vhau mun'gonna dzovapikirizani vemutangiro uye ndikanosangana navamirira vanoda kupikirira kugwara. Mungu rino ndakavigiravo kushandira [Polkadot Ambassador](https://polkadot.com/community/ambassador-program) kunokuti ndakabatsira kuvagarira vakachechi uye ndakavigira IRL London picnic kwaakumwaira varume vane zana zvinganana kusanganisa mati mufunga egumo uye vamirira.
TimelineContent.timeline2020Title: Crypto Teen & kupida zvesikora kuita mabvunzo
TimelineContent.timeline2020Description: Inguvai ndairenda nesikoradzi re-drama ku [Emil Dale Academy](https://www.emildale.co.uk), ndakavhura Crypto TikTok zvidzidziso zvechimiro chakavakidza Gen Z paCrypto. Muumbiro rwekukasira muomukaro ndakabvisa kupikirira varume vane zana zvine zvisanu varima veRangers, mavhindu nemabasa paza vanganei vanganei vomukaro wakusina mari. Vakabvisa kuchinjura zvisanu zvine kumwe. Ndakavigira kupikirira Zoom munzira yomuskina yesikora chikati vaviri vamaitano vamashoma vanove ne data vurume panhatu chikati ndikavhura zvesimu uye mabhizinesi vanokupa zvakafanana nokupikirira VCs negwara. Raiva ramba muhaka hwekaresvi munguva yangu uye rainoderedza richienda. Iriyi nairongo kwayoremagedzi rekwazvo ndakaverenga gumi remubasa wesikoradzi kupikirira rupurudi rurona kuzvitengesa paku-eBay kubatsira mari yesikora mushure mekutenda kuna Gary Vee, rakarapika!
TimelineContent.timeline2019Description: Ndakasangana neEthereum vakachechi muna 2019 mushure mekunzwisisa matasimusi emufunga.
TimelineContent.timeline2017Description: Vamwe vasikora vangu vaizvitengesa zvimbidzo pasina chikonzero, ini ndaiva ndichigadziridza zvitini zvesimu pamari.
TimelineContent.photo2025_7: Miaka yina nemakumi maviri uye ¬£20k mukuxiwa
TimelineContent.timeline2026Description: Mugore uyu LiquidOps akawana [Astro](https://www.astrousd.com/), iyo yakagadzirwa neshanyalala yangu [Kadar Sayed Abdi](https://x.com/0xKadar).
TimelineContent.photo2026_3: Mhosva yangu yeUS O1 Visa yakamirikirwa!

AngelPage.title: Angel Investing
introAndElevator: Ndinofarira kusangana nevamirira vavamirira vanoumbira chinhu vavenzi chavanetsika chaizvo. Kana ndichivona mawere uye nzira dzandingaita zvishanda kunze kwemari chete, ndinotaka kusangana nose.

Ndinozvivhara zvikasanda kusvika **$500 uye $5,000** muvhara dzeune-seed nemvura yeuzra. Kunyange zvikasanda kusvika zvi-checks zvinobigira, ndinovhara kuti ndive nomubatanidzwa. Zvinhu zvizvo zvinodanidza kupikirira, product feedback, technical advice, kana kuti kugona kuva mumwe wokuronga rupinzani, zvichizvivhara zvakadzikisa pano pasi.

Kushikulitsidza, ini muno ndimumirinzi mumubasa wokuumbira uye ndinofunga ndizove mumwe kuitira nguva haina kumberi, saka ndinogona kushandira kuwanikan mune ndangezo yemumirinzi wangu muchidziro. Ndinozvivhara zvizvo mu mavhindu okuumbira mumazungiro akafanana ne zvanondiumbira zvino kana zvaandakavaka muishure, saka ndinogona kushandira kuwanikan murwendo, zvichiti: mhen pano [angel investing disclosures](/disclosures).
helpItems: Ndinozvivhara kuti ndikure kure nema legal/accounting murwendo, asi ndinogona kurutikirira ndipi pavamwe vanozivi ‚Äî mavyakeri, vavakonti, uye maspecialist (uye ndinoda kusigudzira kuti havisi kuzvipembesa nezvikutanidza zviri zvikuru). Kusvika zvino ndakavika 4 limited companies muUK uye 1 Delaware C corporation.
Ndakadzisunzira kuva fullstack developer kubva muinternet
Ndakakurumidza mazvinotevera aizvo anogona kuita basa zvakakurumidza
Ndakaverenga fundraising rounds kunze kune VCs, accelerators, grant foundations, uye decentralised blockchain treasuries
Ndakavigira muStartups/VCs/corporates uye ndakavigira zvizvinhu zvese, kusanganisa CEO, engineer, analyst, had COO responsibilities uye ndakava private software contractor
Sezvinogara zvinosanganisira mumwebhusayiti yangu, ndi SCRAPPY. Izvi ndizvishamba zvandine uye zvandafunga ndinogona kubatsira kuumbira/kunatidza.
Ndakavhura waitlist ine zvikwatanidza zvazvizvisunzira uye zvakageza kusvika $55m musoft commits
Ndakavaka/design/launched zvinhu zvakawanda muchidziro chezvinotevera uye corporate environments
Ndakavaka pitch decks, pitches, uye business plans zvakaverenga uye zvikasande
AngelPage.pressureTitle: Ndinotora Ruupinzani Pasi Pokushambidza uye Ndichizviruwisa
pressureItems: Ndakagadzira 2 major black swan events mune live mainnet DeFi protocol
Ndarangarira pamberi pemutambo wenguva dzese/online uye zvose zvakabudirira uye ZVESE ZVESVINYU speeches
Ndakavigira IP, ndakavigira IP, uye ndakawana companies
Ndakavaka muti uye zvose zuva ndakavigira uye ndakavigira mamwe mashama
Ndakavigira novavakonti, mavyakeri, freelancers, uye marketing firms
Ndakavigira varume vane zana zvine kunze vakaverenga (zvino ndinofunga ndiri nenzira dzezvakakurudza)
Ndaiva nomwari kutsvaga mabasa asingagere, pazhinji pakuine nzvimbo dzakadzikira
Ndakavigira kuzvipira 1-1 negative feedback uye naizvozvo ndakavigira zvakawanda kara
Ndakavhura uye ndakasvibidzira workplace & other founder bullies
Ndakavigira mugwara yecompany cultures, ndakavigira zvinobvimbi, ndakavaka zvinobvimbi, uye ndakagadzira gwara rangu mucompany zvikati zvakawanda kara
Muvhara risingaperi ndaiva actor. Ndinogona kubatsira kuratidza shuma munzira yeyesocial media content uye demo day pitches
Ndakavigira VC pitches zvakaverenga uye zvakavimba zvizvi
Ndakavigira kuteesa uye ndakavhura muvhara muhackathons (zvino zvaka-won neni imwe kara, loser)
Ndinovhura kuumba maprofesa uye kuenzanisa zvakakwete seFigma naWebflow
AngelPage.mistakesTitle: Magamuchire Makuru Andakavigira Kuti Handikude Kumuchidziro
mistakesItems: Ndakashandura zvikuru $50k USD pamari ezvehurumende yefandisiro yemari iyo yayingwanira kuva $5k
Ndakashandura $75k USD pazvinhu zvekutarisa zvemari yechiuru chinoregerera kumureza-wemari-zvigadzirwa
Ndakaramba gore rimwe richigadzira chimwe chinhu nekudzidzira kushanda nokuburira
Ndakavimbisa chimwe chinhu chenguva yemari icho chakawedzera mhuri yangu yose yemari yepachimiro, ndikave mune -$60k pamureza wenguva ichiuru nene deni
Ndakaputsa zvikuru nhare yangu yemari yechiuru yepachimiro pamwechete nanhau yangu yepachimiro sezvoresi, ndipo ndakagadzirwa
Ndakakanganwa kukosha kwedhora rimwe rimwe nekuwanda kwaro
Ndakakosera nhema inoverengeka mazana akati matanhatu emari nemhuri yangu kwete neshona kubva kumhuri yangu yepachimiro dzakakosa
AngelPage.astroDescription: Astro inoramedza blockchain liquidity management sebvura-yemari issuer.
AngelPage.velaventuresDescription: Web3 venture studio yamashure maapu senge [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com), [Vento](https://ventoswap.com/?tab=swap) uye [AO Sync](https://github.com/vela-ventures/ao-sync-sdk).
AngelPage.upshotDescription: Musangano wokutanga wenzvimbo dzechange-muudziro yezvizvi, zvakavakwa munzvimbo yeBase ecosystem.
AngelPage.saySoDescription: Musika we-Web3 wekuva nemazano wakavakwa mu-Sei blockchain ecosystem.
AngelPage.plasmaOrbitalDescription: Kumpani yekugadzira network ye-micro satellite yeshanduko ye-maritime patrolling.

content.content: Peji iyi ine zvinhu zvokutarisa zvakanyanya nekuda kwemari yangu yomumusha panyika. Dzandei munyaya iyi zvakanyanya kana musati makumbira.
Mari Yangu Yomumusha Chete

Ndakashambadza mari yangu yomumusha. Handisi **kumashambadza** kapital yepano yezvemari, handisi **kumirayira** chakuti kapital, uye handisi **kugamuchira** mari kubva kumashambadzi akadaro (LPs) kana vamwe vagezi veshambadzo. Shambadzo dzose dzine shungu dzinoshambadzwa neni chete ichinoshandisa mari yangu.
Haisi Zvakarayirwa Zveshambadzo

Chinhu chese panyika iyi hapashambadzwi kunge shambadzo, hurumende, mbarananga, kutaridzira zvemari, kana hupenyu. Handisi **kumikidza** kana kumirayirwa neFCA kana vamwe vagezi veshambadzo veshume. Shambadzo iyo yauyu inobatirwa nemi chete.
Handisi Nerudzi Rwevashambadzi

Handidi kushambadza zvakanyanya zviri shungu kune varesi kana zveshambadzo kune vanhu ivo vashambadzwa neni zvakanyanya zvakavharwa pane zviratidzo zve shambadzo. Ndinovaresi, handisi muramusha, muratidzi, kana vagezi veshambadzo.
Haisi Kukumbira Shambadzo
Chinhu chese panyika iyi hapakuti kukumbira, zviratidzo, kana kupikisa kuvako shambadzwe cheshambadzo, hutano, kana chimwe chinhu cheshambadzo. Zvinhu zveshambadzo yangu dzine nzira yetariko chete.
Haisi Kupikisa Shambadzo

Kukumbira neni kana kurandira kwangu zviratidzo zvako hazvigone kupikirwa kuti ndichashambadza. Ndinezvikumbiro zvishoma zvakanyanya uye ndichashambadza zvishoma zvikuru gore rimwe (chinai 1-2 chete).
Kushandira Kumashambadzi Akakwanira

Ndinorarira gore rose muzvemari yangu icho, uye ndichagara ndichiti ndichazvidi zvakara, saka handisiri kushandira shambadzo dzine zvemari zvangu zvakanyanya. Ndinoshambadza zvakazi zvishanu zvinokwanira kumitemo icho chaigwinya kana chakagadzirwa neni gore rose, saka ndingagona kushandira zvakazi zvakakwanira ruwandu.
Handina Zveshambadzo Zvemuramusha

Handina kubatai varesi kana vasina zveshambadzo. Ndini ndinoikonzeresa kuti vagezi havanzi zvakanyanya (nebvunzuko reDhisa) ‚Äî [tarisa Steve Jobs achipikisa zvakavharwa](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-c4CNB80SRc). Ndinoshambadza chete kune vasine zveshambadzo icho ndineudzo hwokuti ndichita neudzo hwokuti ndingashandire.
Kutanga Kushandira Shambadzo

Handina kugonesa kuva neshambadzo zvakanyanya kune varesi vane shambadzo zvakawanda. Ndinoshambadza chete kutanga uye ndingave zvakanyanya kushandira vanhu vane shambadzo zvakakwanira (kune zvakadzva kunaBhiji A). Asi kana varesi vane shambadzo zvakawanda vandirikuona kuti ndingaba neshambadzo, ndichigara ndichida.
Kutariza Kwemari
Zveshambadzo zvemari zvakatariswa (zvakadai SEIS kana EIS) zvine tsika dza vanhu vamwe uye mitemo yeHMRC. Pakubvunza muranga wenyu wemari. Handina kumikidzo chimwe chese zvepane shambadzo yemari.
Kuronga Rungano

Kana mukundipawo rungano icho rine zvemari chete, ndichavako zuva negudo, asi handisiri kuona kuti rungano icho rakasigirwa zvakanyanya. Ndingapura rungano rakaita chakafanana kubva kuvaresi vashoma. Regai kuparadzira rungano icho musati modenga kuti rikotoredzwa. Kana haisi mundiri rurangano rwemari rimwe, handina tsiko yekuronga rungano icho.
Zveshambadzo Zvakakwanira

Ndingashambadza zveshambadzo zvakakwanira zvine rungano rimwe zvakafanana kana zvakakwanira zvine zveshambadzo icho icho murichigadzira. Handina tsiko yekutariza zveshambadzo zvangu zvishoma kuvanhu, uye handina tsiko yekuroga kuti ndisakwande zveshambadzo zvakakwanira.
Murangariro Wetsiko

**Shambadzo remumusha kubvu-zveshambadzo zvakasingathegi zvine nyaya dzikuru dzetsikiriro.** Ungaurayi mari yako yose. Shambadzo repakati hazvigone kupikirwa pakuwara kwezvishoma zvikare. Chinoona cheshambadzo chingaburuka nezvakavharwa chete. Shambadzo rezvakasingathegi havigonetsikira uye hazvigone kugara hutepu hwemari hwako kuzviuru zvakawanda, kana hazvigone zvakare.

content.title: Zvokubva kuBhiji
content.content: Ndini **Muresi Wakanyora Wokwanira Zvakanyanya** pasi peShirudzo yezvemari neveshambadzo Zvinhu 2000 (Chiratidzo cheshambadzo) Zvinhu 2005. Ndinoratidza pane zvinhu zvokuti ndakashanda mugwaro nezvakanyanya mundoto yezvemari kuve zvemari zveshoma uye zveshambadzo zvine zveshambadzo zvakawanda gore rimwe nerimwe (sembavha yepamureza weshambadzo yemari inotariza zveshambadzo zvakakwanira).
content.note: **Kune Varesi:** Paunduparadzira zvemari zveshambadzo, unopikisa kuti watariza zveshambadzo zvakanyanya pasi pezvomureza yeshambadzo yeBhiji uye unogona kuti ndiine tsiko yokugamuchira zvinhu zvakaita zvakavharwa. Kana unoda kuti ndisaine murango wezvinhu zvakawedze kana zvakundirahwidza, ndichigara ndichida.

content.content: Kana mune mibvunzo nezveshambadzo izizvozvi, bvunzai neni heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Kupika Kuti Unobatai Zvemari Zvakavharwa

Paunozibvisa uye unogadzira lorimerjenkins.com ("Nyika"), unopikisa kuti uchabatai Zvemari Zvakavharwa "Zvemari Zvakavharwa" ("Zvemari"). Kana hazvigone kubatai Zvemari Zvakavharwa, regai kushandira Nyika.
Kutsanangura Zveshambadzo
Lorimerjenkins.com ndinoramusha yeLorimer Jenkins. Nyika inotariza rungano panyika zvangu, zveshambadzo, shambadzo remumusha, uye chinhu cheshambadzo chine zvimwe.
Kushandira Nyika
Kushandira Zvakafanira
Unopikisa kuti ushandire Nyika chete kune zvemari zvakataura nemigwiro uye zvakavharwa zvesimba. Zvishada zvakavharwa zvine:

items: Kupikisa kugeza panyika kana zveshambadzo zvayo
Kurandira virasi, hutano, kana chituno chakakwanira

content.content: Kibviso kuNyika
Ndinoshandira tsiko yokutsinza, kusimukira, kana kusiya Nyika nguva ipi neipi henguva, kuroga kibviso ku zvishama zvakavharwa zvenyika, uye kuroga vanhu vane rushano.
Rungano Reshambadzo remumusha

Rungano reshambadzo remumusha reNyika inotariza nzira chete. Chinhu chese panyika hachipikire shambadzo, tsinzo yezvemari kana hutano, kana shambadzo yemari, hurumende, kutariza, kana mbarananga. Handisiri kumikidzo kana kumirayirwa neFCA. Tarisa [shambadzo rangu remari](/disclosures) kune zvakavharwa zvakanyanya.
Mvuno Yenyaya

Kunze kweshambadzo, chinhu chese panyika, inosanganisira zvimwe, mafoto, zvishada, zviratidzo, mavhidio, uye kodhi, ndezveLorimer Jenkins uye vari pasi pezvemari yechimwe chete uye zvimwe zveshambadzo.

Unogamuchira kumashambadzi akashoma, akasanduka, kusakagara kuitora Nyika kune zvemari zvemari zvezwako. Hazvigone kutsanya, kuparadzira, kana kuronga Nyika nzira nekubvunzuka, kugadzira zveshambadzo zvakafanana, kuita Nyika yemari, kana kuburisa zvemari kana shambadzo muNyika.
Kuparadzira neGonano

Kana mukundipawo shambadzo yezvemari, zvemari, kana rungano rimwe kudzidzira zveshambadzo zvemari icho: munobatai zvemari zvako chete, munogamuchira tsiko yakasanduka yekutariza uye kunzwa zvemari zvako, handina tsiko yokutariza kana kushambadza zvemari, ndingapura rungano rakaita chakafanana kubva kuvaresi vashoma, uye muri neshambadzo yokuroga rungano rwako rwemari.
Zviungo Zvepanze

Nyika ingave kuva neshungu kuNyika yemari iyo inotariza chete. Zvikumbiro izvozvi zvinogamuchira chete. Handina tsiko yechuma, zvakanyanya, kana zveshambadzo zveNyika yepanze, zvetsiko zvipinde kuNyika yepanze, kana kibviso yeNyika yepanze.
Kusharira Zvemari
**NYIKA INOTARIZA PAN "HONGU" UAND "INOTARIZA" BASIS PASINA ZVEMARI ZVAKAZVIRI**, kana kushambadza, zvinhu, zvemari, zveshambadzo, kana kushandisa, zvemari yakakwanira, chete kana kutariza.
Kusimukira Zvetsiko

**ZVAKAKWANIRA ZVAKANYANYA MULAW, LORIMER JENKINS HAIZOTSI NE** akashandura, akashoma, akakwanira, akatariswa, kana akauraya tsiko, kutora zvemari, kumira, zvemari, kana kushandira Nyika, shambadzo zvetsikiriro, kana tsiko yekutariza rungano reNyika.

Kusimukira iyi kunoita zvese zvakahwinyirwa uye kunyange ndikati handina kutendeuka kutsiko iyi. **Chete hazvigone kuburuka kuzviuru zvakaburuka zvakakwanira zvemari zvako zvakakwanira kuenda kuna Nyika (iyo hazvigone kuva zero).**
Kuvashandira Vanhu Veshambadzo

Unopikisa kuvashandira, kuvarira, uye kuva neshambadzo revanhu veshambadzo Lorimer Jenkins kubva kumibvunzo iyo, zvetsiko, kutorwa, zveshambadzo, uye zvehurumende zvibvira kushandira Nyika, hurumende repane Zvemari, hurumende yevanhu vashoma, zvemari zveshambadzo iyo waparadzira, kana rungano richo waparadzira.
Rungano Rweshambadzo
Kushandira Nyika kunorungwa neshambadzo yangu yeshambadzo reNyika [Privacy Policy](/privacy), iyo ionzwa muzvemari izvozvi..
Kushandura Zvemari

Ndinoshandura tsiko yokutsinza Zvemari izvozvi nguva ipi neipi. Kushandura kunobatai zvakakwanira pashambadzo nekushambadza zvinhu zvakashandura "Mushure Weshambadzo". Kushandira Nyika mushure kwezvakashandura kunonzwa kuti vakapikirwa zvinhu zvakashandura.
Kuroga Zvemitemo

Zvemari izvozvi zvakarugwa uye zvakaunganidzwa zvichidarika zvemitemo yeBhiji neWeilisi. Zvitsiko zveshambadzo zvinogoneka kupikirwa nezvomirangano nebvunzuko, uye kana iyo haigoneke, zvigaro zveBhiji neWeilisi zvine tsiko yokutariza.
Kusanganisira
Kana zvimwe zvinhu zvemari zvakavharwa zvakatariswa kuva zvisina tsiko kana zvakavharwa, zvakavharwa zvakasara zvinogoneka kuchidzira chete.
Kubvunzika
Kana mune mibvunzo nezvemari izvozvi, bvunzai neni heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Paunozibvisa uye unogadzira Nyika, unopikisa kuti waverenga, wakunzwisisa, uye unobatai Zvemari Zvakavharwa izizvozvi.
Kumisikidza

Tiri nezvemari kuna lorimerjenkins.com ("Nyika"). Rungano reShambadzo iyi rinotariza zvakavharwa zvokuti Lorimer Jenkins ("Ndi," "ini," kana "zangu") chidonzwa, kushandira, uye kuvarira rungano paunozibvisa Nyika yemari yemunhu.
Zvokuti Ndinochidonzwa
Rungano Icho Ndinochidonzwa Zvakazviri
Paunozibvisa Nyika, ndinochidonzwa rungano rimwe remari kubudikidzi reGoogle Analytics, inosanganisira:

items: Nyika icho unogadzira uye nguva yeshambadzo panyika iyo

content.content: Rungano Icho Waparadzira
Zvakare, Nyika haiya chidonzwa rungano rwemari kubva kuvanhu kubudikidzi bezvinhu zvemari kana zvakare, neshambadzo rimwe irikutsika:

**Kubvunzwa Kuvashambadzi remumusha:** Kana mutsvagire mukubvunza neni kudzadzisiro reshambadzo remumusha kubudikidzi bezvinhu zvemari, ndingachidonzwa uye kuchiisa rungano richo waparadzira, inosanganisira zita rako, nhamba yezvinhu zvepanzeve, rungano rezvinhu zveshambadzo, shambadzo, uye chinhu chese chakakwanira muzvemari zvako.
Zvokuti Ndinoshandira Rungano Rwako

Ndinoshandira rungano richchidonzwa kubudikidzi reGoogle Analytics kuzvinhu zvezvakaita zvakanyanya zvokuti vanhu vashandira Nyika, kutsanya nzira uye zvokushandira Nyika, kuongorora zvemari zveshambadzo, uye kuongorora shambadzo reNyika.
Ndinoshandira rungano rwakajeka kubudikidzi bezvezvemari zveshambadzo kutariza zvokushandira shambadzo, kubvunzika nevaresi, uye kuisa zvemari zveshambadzo.
Google Analytics

Nyika inoshandira Google Analytics, chishambadzo chezvinhu zvemari icho chinopivwa naGoogle LLC. Google Analytics inoshandira zvikumbiro kuti kushandira zvokuri vanhu vanoshandira Nyika. Kune zvakakwanira zvokuri Google inoshandira rungano, tarisa: [Google's Privacy Policy](https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites)
Kubvisa Kuna
Ungaburisa Google Analytics nezvokuwedzera [Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout) kana kutsanya zvemari zvako zvokuroga zvikumbiro.
Zvikumbiro

Zvikumbiro ndezvishama zvakakwanira zvemari icho zvichisirwa panyika yako. Nyika inoshandira zvikumbiro chete kubudikidzi reGoogle Analytics nokuzvinhu zveshambadzo zvakatariswa. Ungaongorora zvikumbiro zvako kubudikidzi bezvezvako zveshambadzo.
Kudziisa Kwemari

Google Analytics rungano rinodziswa kune mahure makumi maviri nesitsi kubva zuva richidonzwa, after iyo rinonyangarika. Rungano richo raparadzira kubudikidzi bezvezvemari zveshambadzo rinodziswa kune zvakare rimwe kana chakataura neLaw.
Kubvunzwa Kuvashambadzi remumusha
Kana mukundiparadzira shambadzo kana rungano rimwe reshambadzo:

items: Ndingaparadzira rungano kuzvogezi zvepanzviko pasi peshambadzo yeshambadzo kana chakataura
Handisiri kuona kuti rungano icho rakasigirwa zvakanyanya
Handichavako kana kuparadzira rungano rwako nevanhu vashoma kune zvemari
Regai kuparadzira rungano icho musati modenga kuti rikotoredzwa

content.content: Zviungo Zvepanze
Nyika ingave kuva neshungu kuNyika yepanze. Handina tsiko yeshambadzo yeNyika yepanze. Ndichikukumiranyi kuongorora zveshambadzo zvavo.
Zvemari Zvako

Zvakavharwa zvako nzvimbo yako, ungave nerungano icho rwakaita kubudikidzi nezvinhu zvemari zvako, bvunza kuburisa rungano rwako, rwiba kushandira rungano, uye kubvisa. Kudzidzira zvemari zvako, bvunzai neni heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Kune Vanhu VeBhiji (GDPR)

Kana muri muBhiji, mune rungano rimwe icho iyo igoneka mubudikidzi reGeneral Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Muriko woshambadzo werungano rwako nderungano remari remungu yokutsanya uye kuongorora Nyika, uye kune shambadzo zerungano, muriko werushambadzo remari remungu yokuongorora zvoshambadzo zvemari.
Kune Vanhu VeKalifoonia (CCPA)
Kana muri muKalifoonia, mune rungano rimwe mubudikidzi reKalifoonia Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), inosanganisira rungano rekuziva zvokuti rungano rwemari richidonzwa uye rungano yekubvisa rungano.
Shambadzo yevana

Nyika haiya kutariza kunguva dzevana zvakavharwa 18. Handina kuchidonzwa rungano rwemari kubva kunguva dzezvishoma 18 zvakanyanya. Kana unofunga kuti ndachidonzwa zvinhu izizvozvi, bvunzai neni kubuisa icho.
Kushandura kwemari
Ndingatsanya Rungano reShambadzo iyi nguva ipi neipi. Zvakashandura zvinogona kuchitariza panyika neshambadzo rezvinhu zvakashandura "Mushure Weshambadzo."
Chitano Chechuma
Kana ndichigara ndichita kuwara rungano rwako, hapana nzira yeinternet iyo ine 100% chete. Handisiri kuona kuti rungano icho rwakavharwa kana rwakachisirwa panyika.
Kubvunzika
Kana mune mibvunzo kudzadzisiro yeShambadzo iyi, bvunzai neni heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Paunozibvisa Nyika, unomumvisa kuchidonzwa uye kushandira rungano zvakavharwa muRungano reShambadzo iyo.

ProjectsPage.title: Mabasa
ProjectsPage.roleAstro: CEO kubva pakuwana, napo angel yepre-seed
ProjectsPage.walletyDescription: A [Polkadot](https://polkadot.com) & [Kusama](https://kusama.network/) ecosystem analytics website, iyo yaironga kuratidza vavanhu vane analytics inobatsira pamusoro pemawaleta avo senge kushandisa, monthly usuage, CSV exporting nefungiro rakabvisa mu network fees. Ndakakokera grants 2 kubva [Kusama DAO](https://dune.com/substrate/kusama-gov), iyo yakadzokera mushure mangwanani zvandaida kuzirana [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com/).
ProjectsPage.othentDescription: The mission of [Othent](https://othent.io) was to enable normal everyday online consumers to access blockchain projects, without the use of complex cryptographic private keys and instead use any Oauth account access like Google. I founded the project as the 1st outside Fellow incubated within [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), a software development company founded by [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) in the [Arweave](https://arweave.org) ecosystem. [Othent](https://othent.io) was then aquired by [Wander](https://wander.app) into their core product, an [Arweave](https://arweave.org) & [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) ecosystem Web3 wallet that has over 50,000 users, becoming [Wander Connect](https://www.wander.app/connect).
ProjectsPage.liquidOpsDescription: A lending and borrowing protocol yakakwirwa pane [AO](https://ao.arweave.net), iyo yaironga kunyarura pamusoro pa$400m kwegumi [Arweave](https://arweave.org) tokens value. Ndakasama-kuremekedza project nesu [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer), ndakava 1st Fellow led company yakakumburwa kubva [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), ndakakokera zviuru zvine [waitlist](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1863863983498805473?s=20) signups iyo yakakura kusvika $55m soft-commits yeiyo neon-chain fund verification, [yakataura](https://x.com/aoTheVentures/status/1813676139795374171?s=20) pane [AO Ventures](https://www.aoventures.io) demo day uye ipapo ndakakokera [$325k pre-seed round](https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/revolutionizing-defi-how-lorimer-jenkins-marton-lederer-are-transforming-arweave-liquidops-1729945). Takakwira mainnet, tine intergrations zhinji dzinosanganisira AO Chrome/IOS/Android wallets [Wander](https://wander.app) ([demo pano](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ODxijaC0Dc)) & [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com) ([demo pano](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GeQ01-rBUPQ&t=11s)). Taizoita zvakare & takakwira audits kuburikidza nefirms [Spearbit](https://cantina.xyz/solutions/spearbit) & [Quantstamp](https://quantstamp.com/).
ProjectsPage.contentCreationDescription: Ndinogadzira zvemukati zvemavhidhiyo pasi pose pemaplatform makuru esocial media. Ndinodikisa izvi kuve nzira nzuri yekuvaka komuniti yangu yeinternet, kuratidza nyika zvandiri kubata nacho uye kusangana nevanhu vatsva munzvimbo dzatsva. Ndakavtangawo podcast inonzi [Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).
ProjectsPage.cryptoTeenDescription: [Crypto Teen](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins) is a cryptocurrency TikTok channel aiming to educate Gen Z on what crypto is, covering basic concepts and know-how in the Web3 blockchain space.
ProjectsPage.subsidisejsDescription: Subsidise JS is a package built to enable [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) to bundle transactions together and pay gas fees for other users transactions via the [ANS-102](https://github.com/ArweaveTeam/arweave-standards/blob/master/ans/ANS-102.md) Arweave network standard. I planned to intergrate this into other projects who wanted to cover their users gas upload fees, which would enable users to not have to pay AR tokens to use a Web 2 consuer app built on Arweave.
ProjectsPage.astroDescription: Astro is the liquidity solution built for seamless integration within Web3 ecosystems. By aggregating multiple stablecoins and fiat currencies into a single, unified asset - USDA, Astro ensures frictionless value exchange between real-world and on-chain applications.
ProjectsPage.coolarweaveaddressDescription: This repo allows you to generate lots of [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) to find cool and unique wallet addresses. Claude will automatically detect the cool addresses based on your desired parameters.
ProjectsPage.aothecomputerDescription: Shamwari yangu ndakataura kwandiri mhando yekuva neshanduko dzine domain iyo yairumbirwa zvakawanda kubva muhwindi-chi, ndakaamazwa (napo ndikakatsamwa zvishoma) uye ndakasagona kusiya kufekereza pamusoro pekiromakwidai aakakokera. Saka ndakakwira kutsvaga Namecheap kuona kana paine kiromakwidai yenguva ine grab. Zvakaitika kuti [AO The Computer .com](https://aothecomputer.com) waive available kugura ne$11.48 pagore, tora iro [redacted] üòú.
ProjectsPage.aohtmlDescription: AO HTML ive tool iyo inokugona kugadzira webpage kuburikidza HTML file iyo auto anokonzwira kusingira content kubva AO network kuburikidza process. Funga decentralised website ine content delivery kuburikidza decentralised provider senge DAO, semuenzaniso website inogona auto konzwira mushure ma DAO proposal yakagona uye Web2 front ends pa Vercel/Netlify vanofanirwa kushandisa ichi script.

BookshelfPage.title: Shelfishe yeEbhuku
BookshelfPage.subtitle: Zvihuku zvakabatsira kuumbira kutsvaga kwangu
BookshelfPage.richDadPoorDadNotes: A great introduction to financial literacy and the importance of assets over liabilities.
BookshelfPage.1984Notes: A chilling and prophetic dystopian novel that remains terrifyingly relevant today.
BookshelfPage.zeroToOneAuthorBio: Co-founder of PayPal and Palantir Technologies
BookshelfPage.zeroToOneNotes: It provides a guide for entrepreneurs on how to build monopolies and create value by questioning conventional wisdom to find new opportunities, challenge competition, and build valuable companies.
BookshelfPage.hardThingNotes: Brutally honest advice on building and running a startup. No sugarcoating, just real experiences.
BookshelfPage.whatYouDoNotes: Fascinating exploration of company culture through historical examples from Toussaint Louverture to Genghis Khan.
BookshelfPage.spareNotes: A candid look into royal life and the pressures of growing up in the public eye as a royal.
BookshelfPage.riseAndFallNotes: A biography that chronicles the lives of Prince Andrew and Sarah Ferguson, from their marriage to the present day.

About.description: Ndiri musununguko wechiteshi chimwe chete wachibva England uye zvino ndichifamba-famba kumatunzvi eUS/UK/EU munAirBnb's. Ndinofarira crypto, startups uye software development. Ndine mbackground munye venture capital neacting. Ndiri zvakare content creator uye ndinotarisira podcast inodanwa [Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).

Podcast.title: Lorimer's Podcast
Podcast.description: Wandira neni mune makunamatisisa akadzika nemavanhu vekutanga, vanotsvaka mari, navavariki mune startup ecosystem. Ndinobvunza nzira dzeshure dzeprojekiti, mafunziro akawanwa, uye mune ramangwaniro yetekinoloji dzakasiyana-siyana.

SubstackSignup.title: Zvive neuzivo
SubstackSignup.description: Bvunza newsletter yangu kuti uwane maposi atsva eblog akaperekedzwa straight kune inbox yako. Ndinonyora nezve startups, crypto, kubva panyika uye zvinhu zvandakadzidziswa kubva pakuita kwangu sendimi.

FAQ.title: Mibvunzo Inowanikwa Kazhinji
FAQ.a1: Ndiri mushandi wekutanga ndichivaka LiquidOps, purotokori yekubvira nekukopesha paMuvhuri weAO. Ndinozoita nzira dzemusika muhusiku hwekutanga hwekupinda-kupinda uye ndinogadzira zvinyorwa pamusika, crypto, nekuvaka munharaunda.
FAQ.q2: Wawanikwa here pamberi yekubatsira kana hurumende?
FAQ.a2: Handiti hurumende sezvo ndinotenda kuti vanhu vehuramende vanowandisana kazhinji. Ndinoda kusanganisa mari pamushandi wekutanga wavasikana vandingoda kubatsira vavake pakupedzisira.
FAQ.a3: Ndikumitumire email ku [heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) nemhando yako yekupinda. Ndinowedzerazve $500-$5,000 munhurongwa dzekutanga dzezvekambani dzinogadzira munzvimbo dzandine ruzivo.
FAQ.a4: Ndinoshanda zvakanyanya neTypeScript, React, Next.js, uye blockchain technologies zvinosanganisira Arweave neAO. Ndini mushandi wenzvimbo dzese andidzisita pachokwadi.
FAQ.a5: Ndinogara ndichitsvaga kuvana navatarangi vachisikwa, vanetsi, nevanhu vanovaka. Swikirana ndimuemeri ku [heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) nezvishoma zvawe uye chizvino chandingade kuita.

FilmsPage.billionsDescription: Chiratidziro chinoita kuti munhu azviwe kuda kuti mudhire wefanzi nepaMhosva yana umwe numumwe.
